description:
For this task, do research on various grants  for open source software projects, HFOSS, humanitarian technology, ICT4D fintech, financial inclusion, or microfinance-related projects. Search on Google and list out the details of each award in this sheet - https://goo.gl/KA5JRH
including its purpose, application date, application requirements, amount/prize, etc. An example of the award is: https://www.tides.org/awards-prizes/pizzigati-prize/



You should find at least twenty grants for this task.
name: Research grants related to non-profits, financial inclusion and open source
